title: Relative extrema from graph of derivative

content.question: The graphs of the derivatives of the functions f, g, and h are shown above. Which of the functions f, g, or h have a relative maximum on the open interval a<x<b ?

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
